name: EZVIZ CS-TY1 1080p 360-Degree WiFi Smart Home Security Camera, Intelligent Surveillance Camera with Night Vision, Smart Tracking, Two-way Audio, White, 1 Count (Pack of 1)
description:
Zero Blind Spots
Keep tabs on every corner with just one TY1 camera. Its expansive 360-degree

ﬁeld-of-view ensures full coverage, so you don’t miss a thing.

2

Smart Tracking
When the camera detects a moving object, it is smart enough to automatically

track the motion while alerting you with an image in real time.

3

Hands Free Two Way Audio
Talk to your loved ones and deter unwelcome strangers – all by using the TY1’s two-way communication feature. Using the EZVIZ App on your mobile device, you can easily and conveniently enjoy communication wherever you might be.

4

See further in the dark
Enjoy round-the-clock protection with the TY1 camera. Using powerful Infrared LED lights, it lets you see up to 10 meters (33 feet) in dim light.

5

We protect your data and privacy.
Protecting your data and privacy is our highest priority. Data transmission between the camera and the EZVIZ Cloud is encrypted from end to end. Only you have the keys to decrypt your data. To get an extra layer of privacy protection, you can always enable the camera’s sleep mode on the EZVIZ App.

6

Two storage options.
With two storage options, you can choose where to save your recordings. The camera can even save to two locations at the same time for added backup in case the camera is damaged, or your network crashes.

name: Tapo TP-Link C220 Pan/Tilt Smart AI 2K 4MP QHD 1440p Home Security Wi-Fi Camera| Alexa & Google Assistant Enabled |Night Vision|Two-Way Audio| Motion Detection
description:
High-Quality Video Recording—— Capture every detail with exceptional clarity in 2K 4MP QHD resolution.
Wide Range of Movement —— Enjoy a full 360º horizontal and 114º vertical range for pan and tilt, allowing you to cover more area.
Enhanced Night Vision —— See clearly even in low-light conditions with advanced night vision that provides visibility up to 30 ft.
Smart AI Detection and Notifications —— Benefit from smart AI technology that detects relevant events and sends you instant notifications.
Sound and Light Alarm: Scare away unwanted visitors using a sound and light alarm that triggers attention-grabbing effects.

name: HiLook by Hikvision THC-B120-PC 2mp Outdoor HD 20 meter IR night vision EXIR Bullet 4-in-1 Camera IP66– White
description:
Reinforce your home security by installing the HiLook 2MP 3.6mm Outdoor Bullet Camera for surveillance. It features precision-driven 2MP high-performance CMOS and 3.6mm fixed focal lens to easily and accurately catch any prowling intruder or untoward activity outside your house. The HiLook 2MP outdoor bullet camera projects a video quality of 1920 × 1080 pixels resolution, letting you take in each and every detail for strict monitoring. In addition, The camera is housed in an IP66-rated plastic for protection against harsh outdoor elements and weather conditions.

Adaptable and Efficient

The HiLook 3.6mm outdoor bullet camera can be switched between day and night modes to incorporate different monitoring aspects to match the external lightening. Its surveillance area extends up to 20m distance to cover more ground.

High-Performance Monitoring

The bullet camera is equipped with a 3.6mm fixed focal lens and 2MP high-performance CMOS to precisely capture all the movements. Its 1920 × 1080 pixels video quality then lets you observe the surveillance data with more accuracy.
Enhanced Night Vision —— See clearly even in low-light conditions with advanced night vision that provides visibility up to 30 ft.
Smart AI Detection and Notifications —— Benefit from smart AI technology that detects relevant events and sends you instant notifications.
Sound and Light Alarm: Scare away unwanted visitors using a sound and light alarm that triggers attention-grabbing effects.

name: TP-Link Tapo C310 Outdoor Security Camera, 3MP with Night Vision and Two-Way Audio
description:
The Tapo C310 delivers 3MP ultra-clear video for detailed surveillance of your home or office. With its full-color night vision, IP66 weatherproof design, and motion detection alerts, this camera ensures 24/7 safety. It supports two-way audio for real-time communication and integrates seamlessly with smart assistants.

Reliable Outdoor Monitoring

With up to 98 ft of night vision range and 3MP resolution, this camera captures every critical detail, even in low-light conditions. Built-in siren and motion detection helps you deter intruders instantly.

name: Reolink Argus 3 Pro Wireless Outdoor Security Camera with Solar Panel
description:
The Argus 3 Pro is a wire-free solar-powered security camera offering 2K video, person/vehicle detection, and night vision. Its rechargeable battery and solar panel make it energy efficient. The camera also includes two-way audio and smart alerts for proactive defense.

Smart, Green & Effective

Perfect for remote locations, this camera supports smart AI detection and cloud or SD card storage. With weatherproof housing, it’s built for all seasons.

name: HiLook by Hikvision THC-B120-PC 2MP Outdoor HD 20m IR Night Vision EXIR Bullet Camera
description:

name: EZVIZ C3W Pro 2K Outdoor WiFi Security Camera with AI Human Detection
description:
EZVIZ’s C3W Pro features 2K resolution, color night vision, and AI-powered human detection. It boasts two-way talk and a loud siren with strobe light to actively ward off intruders. Weatherproof design ensures durability in all climates.

Crystal Clear Protection

Enjoy 2K QHD clarity, a built-in spotlight, and real-time communication. Ideal for driveways, porches, and backyard monitoring with SD card or cloud backup options.

name: Ring Spotlight Cam Plus – Battery with 1080p HD Video and LED Spotlights
description:
Protect your home with the Ring Spotlight Cam Plus. It features HD live view, advanced motion detection, built-in LED spotlights, and two-way audio. With quick battery swap and optional solar panel, it provides constant security.

All-in-One Monitoring

Perfect for entrances or garages, this cam lights up suspicious motion and allows remote alerts and control via the Ring app. Connects with Alexa for voice-controlled security.

name: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery – Indoor/Outdoor Wireless Security Camera
description:
Keep your home safe with the Ring Stick Up Cam Battery. Featuring HD video, motion-activated notifications, and two-way talk, this camera offers reliable coverage. Easy to install indoors or outdoors with flexible placement options.

Smart Coverage

Connects to the Ring App for real-time viewing and supports Alexa integration for voice control.

name: Arlo Pro 4 Spotlight Camera – 2K Video with HDR and Color Night Vision
description:
Capture every detail with the Arlo Pro 4's 2K HDR video. It offers color night vision, a built-in spotlight, and a 160° field of view. Wireless setup and smart alerts make it perfect for modern security needs.

Pro-Level Monitoring

Connects directly to Wi-Fi and features noise-canceling audio with advanced AI detection.

name: Blink Outdoor 4 – Wireless Weather-Resistant HD Security Camera
description:
Blink Outdoor 4 provides HD video, long-lasting battery life, and infrared night vision. With weather-resistant construction, it’s ideal for home perimeter protection.

Smart Alerts

Custom motion zones and two-way audio let you monitor and respond from your phone.

name: EufyCam 2C Pro – Wireless Home Security Camera System with 2K Resolution
description:
EufyCam 2C Pro delivers sharp 2K images with 180-day battery life. Comes with night vision, AI motion detection, and local storage options.

Secure & Smart

No monthly fees and works seamlessly with HomeKit, Google Assistant, and Alexa.

name: Wyze Cam v3 – Indoor/Outdoor 1080p Security Camera with Color Night Vision
description:
The Wyze Cam v3 supports both indoor and outdoor use with full HD video and color night vision. Features sound detection and weatherproof housing.

Versatile Security

Supports SD card recording and live stream via the Wyze App.

name: Google Nest Cam (Battery) – Indoor/Outdoor Wireless Smart Camera
description:
The Google Nest Cam is battery-powered and offers intelligent alerts, night vision, and crisp HD video. Ideal for home monitoring with Google Assistant integration.

Effortless Smart Security

Get notifications for people, animals, and vehicles right on your phone.

name: ZOSI 1080p HD Bullet Camera – Night Vision and Motion Detection
description:
ZOSI’s 1080p Bullet Camera features motion detection, night vision up to 80ft, and IP66 weatherproofing. Compatible with DVR systems for 24/7 monitoring.

Reliable Performance

Great for large property or commercial surveillance needs.

name: ANNKE 5MP Lite Wired Security Camera – Outdoor with IP66 Weatherproof
description:
ANNKE’s 5MP camera delivers enhanced detail with smart IR night vision up to 100ft. Durable metal housing and IP66 weather resistance for any climate.

Pro Surveillance

Supports hybrid video output and wide compatibility.

name: Swann Bullet Camera – 1080p Full HD with Heat and Motion Sensing
description:
Swann’s 1080p Bullet Camera uses True Detect™ heat and motion sensing to reduce false alerts. Includes night vision and sturdy construction.

Smart Motion Alerts

Integrates with Swann DVR and app for easy access.

name: Hikvision DS-2CE16D0T-IRP – 2MP Outdoor Bullet Camera
description:
The Hikvision 2MP Bullet Camera is known for its durability and crisp imaging. Features IR night vision and IP66 weatherproof design.

Commercial-Grade Clarity

Ideal for offices, warehouses, and home exteriors.

name: Amcrest UltraHD 4K Bullet Camera – Outdoor PoE IP Camera
description:
Amcrest UltraHD delivers stunning 4K footage with motion alerts, night vision, and PoE for easy wiring. Built for outdoor use.

Premium Protection

Mobile app, browser access, and cloud options included.

name: Lorex 4K Nocturnal IP Camera – Smart Motion Detection and Color Night Vision
description:
The Lorex 4K IP Camera offers Nocturnal Color Night Vision and smart motion alerts. Built-in mic and metal housing provide pro-grade reliability.

Top-Tier Surveillance

Great for full-property coverage with smart zone setup.

name: YI Outdoor Security Camera – 1080p with Night Vision and AI Alerts
description:
The YI Outdoor Camera streams 1080p video with night vision, smart AI human detection, and two-way audio.

Easy Monitoring

Weather-resistant and works via Wi-Fi with YI Home App.

name: Reolink Go PT Plus – 4G LTE Pan Tilt Security Camera
description:
Reolink Go PT Plus is a 4G LTE-enabled pan & tilt cam with 2K video. Perfect for locations without Wi-Fi, it features solar charging support.

360° Freedom

Ideal for cabins, farms, and construction sites.

name: Tonton Wireless Security Camera – 1080p with Floodlight and Siren
description:
Tonton’s camera offers HD video, floodlight, motion detection, and a loud siren. Built to prevent intrusion before it happens.

Complete Deterrence

Control via app and compatible with home DVRs.
